column2: "Nna ɔhen Darius hyɛɛ mbra ma wɔkɔhwehwɛɛ nwomakorafi no mu
column3: mbrɛ wɔdze akoradze sie wɔ Babilɔn no."

column2: "Na wokohun nwoma mbobɔwee bi wɔ Akmetha ahemfie a ɔwɔ Media ɔmansin mu no
column4: na wɔakyerɛw asɛm bi wɔ mu dɛ:"

column2: "Ɔhen Sirus n'afe a odzi kan no mu no
column3: ɔhen Sirus hyɛɛ mbra dɛ; Nyankopɔn ne fi a ɔwɔ Jerusalɛm no dze
column5: ma ɔnyɛ beebi mbrɛ wɔbɔ afɔr
column6: na wɔmma ne fapem nyɛ dzendzenndzen; na no krɔn basafa eduasa na ne tɛtɛr basafa eduasa;"

column2: "nye abo akɛse akyerɛpɛn ebiasa
column3: na ndua kyerɛpɛn kor: na wɔmma womfi ɔhen ne fie mbɔ no ho kaw no:"

column2: "na eso wɔmma Nyankopɔn ne fie sika na dwetɛ ndzɛmba a Nebukadenezar kɛfaa no wɔ asɔrdan no a ɔwɔ Jerusalɛm no mu
column5: na wɔmfa nkɔ asɔrdan no a ɔwɔ Jerusalɛm no mu bio
column7: na fa sisi Nyankopɔn ne fie hɔ."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei ɔwo Tattenai
column5: na hom mfɛfo Afarsakfo a wɔwɔ esuegya noho
column6: hom ntwe hom ho mfi hɔ koraa:"

column2: "hom ngyaa Nyankopɔn fi no ho edwuma no n'ekyir dzi; hom mma Jewfo ambradofo na Jewfo mpanyimfo no nsi Nyankopɔn fi no wɔ ne sibew."
"Nkyii so mara na merehyɛ mbra makyerɛ hom dza hom nyɛ mma Jewfo mpanyimfo yi wɔ Nyankopɔn ne fi no ne nsii mu: ɔnye dɛ hom mfa ɔhen n'efidze no
column5: ntua ahwerdze ne kaw no ntsɛmara mfa mma mbarimba no amma woeenngyaa."

column2: "Na adze a ohia hɔn no
column5: na nguambaa nyina a wɔdze bɔbɔ sor Nyankopɔn hyew afɔr
column10: dɛ mbrɛ asɔfo a wɔwɔ Jerusalɛm no bɛkyerɛ no ara
column11: na wɔmma wɔmfa mma hɔn dabaa

column2: "ama wɔaabɔ afɔr huanhuam ama sor Nyankopɔn no
"Eso m'ahyɛ mbra dɛ obiara a ɔbɛsakyer asɛm yi enyi no
column3: wɔmma wonyi ne dan do mpuna
column4: na wɔnkyekyer no mfam ho nsi hɔ; na wɔmma ne fie nyɛ sumina wɔ iyi ntsi:"

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn a ɔama ne dzin tse hɔ no
column3: ombutuw ahemfo na aman nyinara a wɔbɛtsen hɔn nsa asakyer enyi dɛ wɔresɛɛ Nyankopɔn ne fi yi a ɔwɔ Jerusalɛm yi. Mara Darius na mahyɛ mbra yi: wɔmma wɔmfa mbɔdzembɔ nyinara nyɛ."

column2: "Nna Tattenai
column5: na hɔn mfɛfo no yɛɛ dza ɔhen Darius dze kɔree no dɛm ntsɛmara."

column2: "Na Jewfo mpanyimfo no sisii na wɔyɛɛ prɔmprɔm
column3: ɔnam nkɔnhyɛnyi Hagai na Iddo ba Zekaria nkɔnhyɛ no do. Na wosii ɔdan no na wowiei
column4: dɛ mbrɛ Israel Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm
column7: na Persiahen Artasɛkeses mbra no tse ara."

column2: "Na wowiee fi no wɔ bosoom Adar ne da a otsia ebiasa no a ɔyɛ ɔhen Darius n'ahendzi mu afe a otsia esia no mu."
"Na Israelmba no
column5: wɔdze ahosɛpɛw dzii Nyankopɔn ne fie no mbueida pa no."

column2: "Na wɔbobɔɔ Nyankopɔn ne fi yi no mbueida pa no ho afɔr anantwisaa ɔha
column4: nguambaa ahaanan; na mpɔnkyenyin a wɔdze bɔ Israel nyinara hɔn tsir bɔn ho afɔr
column6: dɛ mbrɛ Israel ebusuakuw ebusuakuw no dodow tse."

column2: "Na wɔdze asɔfo no sisii hɔn ekuw mu
column3: na Levifo no wɔ hɔn nkyekyɛmu mu
column4: wɔdze maa Nyankopɔn no som a ɔwɔ Jerusalɛm no; dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw no wɔ Moses nwoma no mu no."

column2: "Na ndɔmmumkɔfomba no dzii apaho no wɔ bosoom a odzi kan no ne da a otsia duanan no mu."
"Na ɔsɔfo no na Levifo no abɔ mu kor atsew hɔnho; hɔn nyinara hɔn ho atsew: na wokunkum apaho no maa ndɔmmummba no nyinara
"Na Israelmba a wofi ndɔmmumkɔ mu bae no
column3: na hɔn a wɔatsew hɔnho efi asaase no do amanamamfo efifidze ho aba hɔn nkyɛn
column5: Israel Nyankopɔn no so dzii bi
column7: "na wɔhyɛɛ epitsi afahyɛ no enyigye mu araa nda esuon; osiandɛ EWURADZE maa hɔn enyi gyee
column8: na ɔdaan Asiriahen no n'akoma baa hɔn do
column9: ma ɔbɛhyɛɛ hɔn nsa dzen wɔ Nyankopɔn
column11: ne fi ho edwuma no mu."
